description: Welcome to the reproductive health survey
Throughout this survey you can push the # key to repeat what you just heard.
You will now hear some statements.

After you hear each statement, press a number from 0 to 4 on your telephone to state how much you agree with the statement. 0 means 'strongly disagree'; 1 means 'do not agree'; 2 means 'neutral'; 3 means 'agree' and 4 means 'strongly agree'
I am able to decide how household money is spent.
My husband/partner supports the use of family planning.
I openly discuss family planning with my husband.
I am afraid that using an oral contraceptive pill will cause me to never have children in the future even after I stop taking the oral contraceptive pill.
I am afraid that a coil (Intrauterine Device) will cause me to never have children in the future even after the coil is removed.
I am afraid that receiving the birth control shot will cause me to never have children in the future.
Now you will hear suggestions from other women on how to improve the center.
Here is another statement from a women.
We would like to hear your suggestion. In what specific way can the Nutrition Education Center be improved and why? Say your answer after the beep and then press any button on the phone to submit.
In what specific way can the Nutrition Education Center be improved and why?
Thank you for completing the reproductive health survey. Please encourage other women to take this survey too. Good bye!
